resources.string: Please confirm your country code and enter your phone number.
This account is already logged in from this app.
This will remove your contacts from the Jinng servers. If \'Sync Contacts\' is enabled, contacts will be re-synced.
Contacts from this device will be added to this account.
Contacts from this device will not be added to this account.
Contacts from this device will be added to your account.
Turn on to import contacts from this device to your account.
Contacts from this device were added to your account.
We\'ve sent an SMS with an activation code to your phone **%1$s**.
We\'ve sent the code to the **Jinng** app on your other device.
We\'re calling your phone **%1$s**.\n\nDon\'t accept the call, Jinng will process everything automatically.
We are calling your phone **%1$s** to dictate a code.
We will send you an SMS in %1$d:%2$02d

Somebody with access to your phone number **%1$s** has requested to delete your Jinng account and reset your 2-Step Verification password.\n\nIf this wasn\'t you, please enter the code we\'ve just sent you via SMS to your number.
Since the account **%1$s** is active and protected by a password, we will delete it in 1 week for security purposes.\n\nYou can cancel this process at any time.
You\'ll be able to reset your account in:
Your recent attempts to reset this account have been cancelled by its active user. Please try again in 7 days.
The deletion process was cancelled for your account %1$s. You may close this window now.
Set up your first and last name
